• Complete redesign of button
• Compatible with Reddit 4.x
• Add functionality for posts
• A12 support
changelog.1.2.0: Added Apollo & Narwhal support, fixed crash when empty data was received from pushshift.
changelog.1.2.3: Added option to enable the eye for only deleted comments in Apollo, better fix for Apollo UI, reimplement option in Narwhal menu
changelog.1.2.5: Added Reddit support for ios 10 and several other app versions (4.21 ->)
changelog.1.2.6: Added more Reddit support (4.0 ->) for some reason
changelog.1.2.7: Added request timeout option, switch to Cephei prefs

Packages.description:
See what those pesky "[deleted]" comments and posts were without leaving Reddit!

For Reddit: To use, tap the "..." button on comments or a self text post, and then tap on the new option called "TF did that say?". The comment/post will then be replaced with what it said when it was archived.
For Apollo: Tap the small eye icon added to comments and self text posts.
For Narwhal: Open the "more" menu on comments, tap the new button that says "tf did that say?" to activate. On self text posts, tap the "..." button and do the same thing.

Comments and posts are retrieved using pushshift.

A12 is supported.
Packages.title: undelete

Packages.description: A flash that lasts for 1 second after a video recording is started. Helpful with showing if remote activators actually started the video.
Packages.title: VideoFlashIndicator
